package.name: bbcode
package.description:
This is a quick and efficient BBCode Parsing Library. It provides various tag types, high speed one pass parsing, callback system, tag position restriction.
It will force closing BBCode tags in the good order, and closing terminating tags at the end of the string this is in order to ensure HTML Validity in all case.

release.notes: Initial Release, many things have been stabilized and fixed sized stack have been removed in favour of dynamicaly allocated stack. This is able to reduce memory usage in many case and will reduce risk of stack overflow and therefore segfaults / Arbitrary code execution.
